hotels.name: Golden Tulip Hotel
hotels.descriptions: The Golden Tulip Port Harcourt Hotel is located at No 1C Evo Crescent, GRA Phase 2, Port Harcourt, Rivers state. It is 4-Star rated and situated in the heart of the Port Harcourt metropolis close to several city landmarks and institutions.

hotels.name: Swan Hotel
